summary: Feature request to support gRPC binary metadata headers in the TypeScript SDK's native connection. Currently needs to accept Uint8Array as metadata values and transmit them as binary to Tonic for -bin suffixed keys.
userImpact: Users need to pass binary data in gRPC metadata headers but currently lack native support in the TypeScript SDK.
proposedFix: Accept Uint8Array as metadata value type and send as binary to Tonic for -bin suffixed keys
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented to support Uint8Array metadata values for binary gRPC headers
keyQuote: Probably just need to accept `Uint8Array` as metadata value and send as binary to Tonic for -bin keys
